title: The Strong Dollar, Apple, And Oil (Podcast)
itunes:title: The Strong Dollar, Apple, And Oil (Podcast)
description:
Vince Cignarella, Global Macro Strategist with Bloomberg News, joins the show for his weekly hit to talk about markets, the Fed, and currency and FX. Mark Smith, Senior VP-Investments at Wells Fargo Advisors, joins the show to talk about markets, inflation, and the strong dollar. Ed Ludlow, correspondent for Bloomberg News, joins the show to talk about today’s Apple event and the unveiling of the iPhone 14 and other products, as well as outlook for the company. Jordi Visser, president and CIO at multi-strategy advisers, joins the show to talk about crypto and NFTs and how to break through in the crypto winter. Julia Fanzeres, US Oil Futures reporter with Bloomberg News, joins the show to discuss the outlook for energy and oil in the US. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Mille

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
